Hey! Check out this amazing app called GreenStash. It makes planning and managing your savings goals a breeze, helping you establish the habit of saving money for better things. Download it now from the Play Store: %s
Unlock GreenStash Confirm your screen lock, PIN or password. Authentication succeeded! Authentication failed! Authentication error: %s
Hello! Please select your preferred currency to get started. Let\'s Get Started!
GreenStash is locked Click the button below to authenticate. Authorize Unlock App App-lock is disabled because the device is unable to authenticate
Saving Goals Open side menu Filter your saving goals Search for specific saving goal. New Goal Let\'s start by creating a new saving goal! Click on the floating action button to create a new saving goal. Search here‚Ä¶ 404: Goal not found!>
Awesome! Enter amount Cool! Enter amount Deposited Successfully! Withdrawn Successfully! Amount is more than current deposited amount!
Congratulations ü•≥ You\'ve reached your saving goal! Your hard work and commitment have led to this well-deserved accomplishment. Celebrate your success! üéâ Go back to home
No Saving Goals Set. Amount Deposit You\'ve already achieved this goal. Withdraw You haven\'t deposited any amount yet. Are you sure? Deleted Successfully. View goal information. Edit this goal Delete This Goal New goal You\'re off to great start! Keep on keeping on! If you think you can do it, you can. Almost there, You got this! Congratulations 🎉 Currently saved %s out of %s. You\'ve saved %s out of %s.
You have until %s (%s) days left.
You need to save around %s/ day. week. month. As you\'ve not specified any deadline, you got all the time in the world! It\'s time to celebrate all the hard work that led to this joyful occasion.
Goal Information You\'ve Saved Out of %s %s days left. No deadline set. Goal achieved! üéâ Goal Priority is %s Reminders are enabled Reminders are disabled Notes Copy Copy Notes Copied Successfully! No Transactions Yet. Update Transaction Tip! Swipe transactions left or right to edit or delete them.
It\'s time to save! Edit Saving Goal Select icon for your goal. ‚Ä¶Or if minimalism is your style, add an icon for your goal. Goal icons will be used on compact styled goal cards, Settings > Goal Card Style Goal Image Add images to your goals to give them a personalized look! Click on the floating action button to add an image to your goal. You don\'t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step. ‚Äì Martin Luther King, Jr. Select priority for your goal. Saving Reminders Enable Reminders to Stay Updated on Your Goals! Reminders will be sent daily, semiweekly, or weekly, depending on goal priority. Goal Title Woops! Title is empty. Target Amount Woops! Amount is empty or Invalid. Deadline (Optional) Notes (Optional) Set New Saving Goal Update Saving Goal Great! Saving goal set. Saving goal updated. Do you want to remove deadline from this goal? Tip! You can remove the deadline from existing goals by long-pressing on the deadline field.
Backup & Restore Backup app data including all of your saving goals, current progress, transactions etc and easily restore it whenever you want. Please note that backups do not include app settings. Backup Restore Backup restored successfully!
Settings Display Default Theme Change Theme Light Dark System Default Black Theme Enable black AMOLED theme Apply Material You Switch theme according to your wallpaper (A12+ Only) This feature is only for devices running Android 12 or above. Goal Card Style Classic Compact Locales Date Format Change Date Format Preferred Currency Select Preferred currency Security Biometric Lock Use your fingerprint or screen lock password to unlock GreenStash Miscellaneous License & Acknowledgement Show open source license information. App Information Show app version and useful links.
Goal Style Tip! You can swipe a compact-styled card left or right to either edit or delete a savings goal.

About README Checkout the GitHub repository and the app\'s README. Privacy Policy Read our latest privacy policy and terms of service on GitHub. GitHub Issues Submit bug reports or feature requests by creating an issue on GitHub. Telegram Group Join us at telegram to share your ideas or just to chat!
